This is a x265 HEVC video, HE-AAC audio encode of the fanedits of the Battlestar Galactica finale s4e19 Daybreak, the 150 minute extended Blu-Ray version.

The 2 parts of the fanedit are Daybreak Part1 Before The Fall and Daybreak Part2 Battle Of The Colony. Before The Fall has all the flashbacks in s4e19 Daybreak from about 2 years before the fall of the Twelve Colonies right up to the mini-series Night. Before The Fall also includes s4e19 Daybreak, Night Part1 mini-series, and The Plan deleted scenes. The Battle Of The Colony is made up from the non-flashback portions of s4e19 Daybreak.

Daybreak Part1 Before The Fall:
* s4e19 Daybreak (150 minute extended Blu-Ray version), flashbacks
* s4e19 Daybreak, 360p deleted scene flashbacks
* s0e01 Night1 mini-series, 360p deleted scenes before the fall of the Twelve Colonies
* s5e00 The Plan, one scene that was supposed to be a Daybreak flashback

Daybreak Part1 Before The Fall scenes are collected and ordered by character:
00.00-10.05 Laura Roslin

10.06-20.40 Kara "Starbuck" Thrace and Lee "Apollo" Adama

20.41-22.11 Sam Anders

22.12-29.39 William Adama, Saul Tigh and Ellen Tigh
* the scene with Ellen arriving at the bar was last in the broadcast but is placed when it happened

29.40-30.22 Tory Foster and John Cavil with Boomer very briefly at the start

30.23-38.47 Sharon "Boomer" Valerii, Galen Tyrol, Karl "Helo" Agathon and Cally Henderson
* the Boomer and Gina Six clip is from the movie The Plan though it was originally shot as a flashback for s4e19 Daybreak
* Boomer landing hard is a deleted scene from the mini-series, s0e01 Night; some blue screen is visible though unfinished special effects were removed
* The Boomer and Chief "I'm a very bad pilot" scene is also from the mini-series and was included since it occurred during the s4e19 Daybreak flashbacks

38.48-50.03 Gaius Baltar and Caprica Six
* the last scene has the last 25 seconds of "The Shape Of Things To Come" added on at the end

Daybreak Part2 Battle Of The Colony:
* There are no s4e19 Daybreak deleted scenes that are not flashbacks so Battle Of The Colony is all 1080p.

Daybreak Part2 Battle Of The Colony has 3 other changes in addition to removing the flashbacks:
1) Removed 3 pieces of Starbuck dialog just before and during the climactic confrontation between Athena and Boomer:
* "Company let's move!" 2.5 seconds
* "All right, this is really touching, can we get the hell out of here?" 2.5 seconds
* "Eh, can we not tell her the plan?" 1.5 seconds

2) Removed the following 3 clips from the very end of s4e19 Daybreak:
* The robot montage with Jimi's Watchtower playing, 35 seconds
* Head Six and Head Baltar walking away on the busy city side walk, 12.5 seconds
* The credits, 4.25 minutes

3) Added a new ending that starts just after Head Baltar says "silly me ... silly, silly me":
* A 7 minute montage of upbeat clips set to Jimi Hendrix's version of All Along the Watchtower
